text: Some time later, in the third year of the famine, the Lord’s message came to Elijah, “Go, make an appearance before Ahab, so I may send rain on the surface of the ground.”

So Elijah went to make an appearance before Ahab.

Now the famine was severe in Samaria.
So Ahab summoned Obadiah, who supervised the palace. (Now Obadiah was a very loyal follower of the Lord.
When Jezebel was killing the Lord’s prophets, Obadiah took 100 prophets and hid them in two caves in two groups of 50. He also brought them food and water.)

<st data-num="0256" class="">Ahab</st> <st data-num="0559 0413">told</st> <st data-num="05662" class="">Obadiah</st>, “<st data-num="01980" class="">Go</st> through the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="04599 04325">springs</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">and</st> <st data-num="03605 05158">valleys</st>. <st data-num="0194" class="">Maybe</st> we can <st data-num="04672" class="">find</st> some <st data-num="02682" class="">grazing areas</st><n id="1" /> so we can <st data-num="02421" class="">keep</st> the <st data-num="05483" class="">horses</st> and <st data-num="06505" class="">mules</st> <st data-num="02421" class="">alive</st> and <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> have to <st data-num="03772" class="">kill</st><n id="2" /> some of the <st data-num="0929" class="">animals</st>.”
They divided up the land between them to search it; Ahab went one way by himself and Obadiah went the other way by himself.
As Obadiah was traveling along, Elijah met him. When he recognized him, he fell facedown to the ground and said, “Is it really you, my master, Elijah?”

He <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>, “<st data-num="0589" class="">Yes</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01980" class="">go</st> and <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st> to your <st data-num="0113" class="">master</st>, ‘<st data-num="0452" class="">Elijah</st> is <st data-num="02009" class="">back</st>.’”<n id="2" />

Obadiah<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="04100" class="">What</st> <st data-num="02398" class="">sin</st> have I <st data-num="02398" class="">committed</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> are ready to <st data-num="05414" class="">hand</st> your <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">over</st> to <st data-num="0256" class="">Ahab</st> for <st data-num="04191" class="">execution</st>?<n id="2" />

As certainly as the Lord your God lives, my master has sent to every nation and kingdom in an effort to find you. When they say, ‘He’s not here,’ he makes them swear an oath that they could not find you.

<st data-num="06258" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="01980" class="">Go</st> and <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st> to your <st data-num="0113" class="">master</st>, “<st data-num="0452" class="">Elijah</st> is <st data-num="02009" class="">back</st>.”’<n id="1" />

But when I leave you, the Lord’s Spirit will carry you away so I can’t find you. If I go tell Ahab I’ve seen you, he won’t be able to find you and he will kill me. That would not be fair, because your servant has been a loyal follower of the Lord from my youth.
Certainly my master is aware of what I did when Jezebel was killing the Lord’s prophets. I hid 100 of the Lord’s prophets in two caves in two groups of 50 and I brought them food and water.

<st data-num="06258" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="01980" class="">Go</st> and <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st> to your <st data-num="0113" class="">master</st>, “<st data-num="0452" class="">Elijah</st> is <st data-num="02009" class="">back</st>,”’<n id="1" /> but he will <st data-num="02026" class="">kill</st> me.”
But Elijah said, “As certainly as the Lord of Heaven’s Armies lives (whom I serve), I will make an appearance before him today.”
When Obadiah went and informed Ahab, the king went to meet Elijah.

<st data-num="01961" class="">When</st> <st data-num="0256" class="">Ahab</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="0452" class="">Elijah</st>, <st data-num="0256" class="">he</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him, “Is <st data-num="02088" class="">it</st> really <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st>, the one who <st data-num="05916" class="">brings disaster on</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>?”
Elijah replied, “I have not brought disaster on Israel. But you and your father’s dynasty have, by abandoning the Lord’s commandments and following the Baals.
Now send out messengers and assemble all Israel before me at Mount Carmel, as well as the 450 prophets of Baal and 400 prophets of Asherah whom Jezebel supports.”
Ahab sent messengers to all the Israelites and had the prophets assemble at Mount Carmel.

Elijah approached all the people and said, “How long are you going to be paralyzed by indecision? If the Lord is the true God, then follow him, but if Baal is, follow him!” But the people did not say a word.
Elijah said to them: “I am the only prophet of the Lord who is left, but there are 450 prophets of Baal.

Let them <st data-num="05414" class="">bring</st> us <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="06499" class="">bulls</st>. Let them <st data-num="0977" class="">choose</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> of the <st data-num="06499" class="">bulls</st> for <st data-num="01992" class="">themselves</st>, <st data-num="05408" class="">cut</st> it up <st data-num="05408" class="">into pieces</st>, and <st data-num="07760" class="">place</st> it <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="06086" class="">wood</st>. But they must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07760" class="">set</st> it on <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st>. <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> the same to the <st data-num="0259" class="">other</st> <st data-num="06499" class="">bull</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">place</st> it <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="06086" class="">wood</st>. But I will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07760" class="">set</st> it on <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st>.

Then you will invoke the name of your god, and I will invoke the name of the Lord. The god who responds with fire will demonstrate that he is the true God.” All the people responded, “This will be a fair test.”
Elijah told the prophets of Baal, “Choose one of the bulls for yourselves and go first, for you are the majority. Invoke the name of your god, but do not light a fire.”

So they <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> a <st data-num="06499" class="">bull</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">as</st> he had <st data-num="05414" class="">suggested</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="06213" class="">prepared</st> it. They <st data-num="07121" class="">invoked</st> the <st data-num="08034" class="">name</st> of <st data-num="01168" class="">Baal</st> from <st data-num="01242" class="">morning</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> <st data-num="06672" class="">noon</st>, <st data-num="0559" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="01168" class="">Baal</st>, <st data-num="06030" class="">answer</st> us.” But there was <st data-num="0369" class="">no</st> <st data-num="06963" class="">sound</st> and <st data-num="0369" class="">no</st> <st data-num="06030" class="">answer</st>. They <st data-num="06452" class="">jumped<n id="2" /> around</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="04196 0834">altar</st> they had <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="01961 06672">At noon</st> <st data-num="0452" class="">Elijah</st> <st data-num="02048 0559">mocked</st> them, “<st data-num="07121" class="">Yell</st> <st data-num="06963 01419">louder</st>! <st data-num="03588" class="">After all</st>, <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> is a <st data-num="0430" class="">god</st>; he <st data-num="03588" class="">may</st> be <st data-num="07879" class="">deep in thought</st>, or <st data-num="03588" class="">perhaps</st> he <st data-num="07873" class="">stepped out for a moment</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">or</st> has taken a <st data-num="01870" class="">trip</st>. <st data-num="0194" class="">Perhaps</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> is <st data-num="03463" class="">sleeping</st> and needs to be <st data-num="03364" class="">awakened</st>.”<n id="1" />

So they <st data-num="07121" class="">yelled</st> <st data-num="06963 01419">louder</st> and, in accordance with their <st data-num="04941" class="">prescribed ritual</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01413" class="">mutilated</st> themselves with <st data-num="02719" class="">swords</st> and <st data-num="07420" class="">spears</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> their <st data-num="05921" class="">bodies</st> were <st data-num="08210" class="">covered</st> with <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st>.<n id="2" />
Throughout the afternoon they were in an ecstatic frenzy, but there was no sound, no answer, and no response.
Elijah then told all the people, “Approach me.” So all the people approached him. He repaired the altar of the Lord that had been torn down.
Then Elijah took 12 stones, corresponding to the number of tribes that descended from Jacob, to whom the Lord’s message had come, “Israel will be your name.”
With the stones he constructed an altar for the Lord. Around the altar he made a trench large enough to contain two seahs of seed.

He <st data-num="06186" class="">arranged</st> the <st data-num="06086" class="">wood</st>, <st data-num="05408" class="">cut up</st> the <st data-num="06499" class="">bull</st>, and <st data-num="07760" class="">placed</st> it <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="06086" class="">wood</st>. Then he <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="04390" class="">Fill</st> <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st> <st data-num="03537" class="">jars</st> and <st data-num="03332" class="">pour</st> the water <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="05930" class="">offering</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="06086" class="">wood</st>.”

When they had done so,<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="08138" class="">Do</st> it <st data-num="08138" class="">again</st>.” So they <st data-num="08138" class="">did</st> it <st data-num="08138" class="">again</st>. Then he <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="08027" class="">Do</st> it a <st data-num="08027" class="">third time</st>.” So they <st data-num="08027" class="">did</st> it a <st data-num="08027" class="">third time</st>.

The <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">flowed down</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">all sides of</st> the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st> <st data-num="01571" class="">and</st> <st data-num="04390 04325">filled</st> the <st data-num="08585" class="">trench</st>.

When it was time for the evening offering, Elijah the prophet approached the altar and prayed: “O Lord God of Abraham, Isaac, and Israel, prove today that you are God in Israel and that I am your servant and have done all these things at your command.
Answer me, O Lord, answer me, so these people will know that you, O Lord, are the true God and that you are winning back their allegiance.”
Then fire from the Lord fell from the sky. It consumed the offering, the wood, the stones, and the dirt, and licked up the water in the trench.
When all the people saw this, they threw themselves down with their faces to the ground and said, “The Lord is the true God! The Lord is the true God!”
Elijah told them, “Seize the prophets of Baal! Don’t let even one of them escape!” So they seized them, and Elijah led them down to the Kishon Valley and executed them there.
Then Elijah told Ahab, “Go on up and eat and drink, for the sound of a heavy rainstorm can be heard.”

So <st data-num="0256" class="">Ahab</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">went on up</st> to <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> and <st data-num="08354" class="">drink</st>, while <st data-num="0452" class="">Elijah</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">climbed</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="07218" class="">top</st> of <st data-num="03760" class="">Carmel</st>. He <st data-num="01457" class="">bent down</st> toward the <st data-num="0776" class="">ground</st> and <st data-num="07760" class="">put</st> his <st data-num="06440" class="">face</st> <st data-num="0996" class="">between</st> his <st data-num="01290" class="">knees</st>.

He <st data-num="0559 0413">told</st> his <st data-num="05288" class="">servant</st>, “<st data-num="05927 04994">Go on up</st> and <st data-num="05027" class="">look</st> in the <st data-num="01870" class="">direction</st> of the <st data-num="03220" class="">sea</st>.” So he <st data-num="05927" class="">went on up</st>, <st data-num="05027" class="">looked</st>, and <st data-num="0559" class="">reported</st>, “<st data-num="0369 03972">There is nothing</st>.”<n id="1" /> <st data-num="07651" class="">Seven</st> <st data-num="06471" class="">times</st> Elijah <st data-num="0559" class="">sent</st> him <st data-num="07725" class="">to look</st>.<n id="2" />

The <st data-num="01961 07637">seventh time</st> the servant<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="02009" class="">Look</st>, a <st data-num="06996" class="">small</st> <st data-num="05645" class="">cloud</st>, the size of the <st data-num="03709" class="">palm of a</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man’s</st> <st data-num="03709" class="">hand</st>, is <st data-num="05927" class="">rising up</st> from the <st data-num="03220" class="">sea</st>.” Elijah<n id="2" /> then <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="05927" class="">Go</st> and <st data-num="0559 0413">tell</st> <st data-num="0256" class="">Ahab</st>, ‘<st data-num="0631" class="">Hitch up the chariots</st> and <st data-num="03381" class="">go down</st>, so that the <st data-num="01653" class="">rain</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">won’t</st> <st data-num="06113" class="">overtake</st> you.’”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="01961 05704 03541 05704 03541">Meanwhile</st> the <st data-num="08064" class="">sky</st> was <st data-num="06937" class="">covered with dark</st> <st data-num="05645" class="">clouds</st>, the <st data-num="07307" class="">wind</st> blew, and there <st data-num="01961" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="01419" class="">heavy</st> <st data-num="01653" class="">rainstorm</st>. <st data-num="0256" class="">Ahab</st> <st data-num="07392" class="">rode</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">toward</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03157" class="">Jezreel</st>.
Now the Lord energized Elijah with power; he tucked his robe into his belt and ran ahead of Ahab all the way to Jezreel.
